tests.description: Backfill creates Brevo contacts and companies for all orgs
tests.setup: Verify all organizations have a non-NULL brevo_company_id in the database, confirming the startup backfill has completed.
steps: In Brevo dashboard, go to Contacts and verify each org owner appears with correct attributes (SCANOPY_USER_ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME)
Go to Companies and verify each org has a company with correct attributes (scanopy_org_id, scanopy_plan_type, entity counts)
Click a company and verify the owner contact is linked to it
tests.expected: Each organization's owner exists as a Brevo contact with correct attributes. Each org has a corresponding company with matching attributes. Contact is linked to company.

tests.description: Login event updates contact's last login date in Brevo
tests.setup: Verify the test user's org has a non-NULL brevo_company_id in the database.
steps: Log in to Scanopy as the test user
In Brevo dashboard, check the contact's SCANOPY_LAST_LOGIN_DATE attribute
tests.expected: Contact's SCANOPY_LAST_LOGIN_DATE is updated to approximately the current timestamp. For newly created contacts, this should already be set to the signup timestamp.

tests.description: Creating/deleting entities updates company metrics in Brevo
tests.setup: Verify the test org has a non-NULL brevo_company_id in the database. Note the current scanopy_network_count and scanopy_host_count on the company in Brevo.
steps: In Scanopy, create a new network
In Brevo, verify the company's scanopy_network_count increased by 1
In Scanopy, create a host on the new network
In Brevo, verify scanopy_host_count increased by 1
In Scanopy, delete the host
In Brevo, verify scanopy_host_count decreased by 1
tests.expected: Company attributes (scanopy_network_count, scanopy_host_count) reflect current DB counts after each change. Updates may be debounced by up to 5 seconds.

tests.description: Submitting enterprise inquiry updates Brevo company and tracks event
tests.setup: Verify the test user's org has a non-NULL brevo_company_id in the database.
steps: In Scanopy, navigate to Settings > Billing
Open the enterprise inquiry modal
Fill in all fields (company name, team size, use case, message, urgency, network count)
Submit the form
In Brevo, check the company for updated inquiry attributes (scanopy_inquiry_date, scanopy_inquiry_urgency, scanopy_inquiry_network_count, scanopy_inquiry_plan_type)
In Brevo, check for an enterprise_inquiry event on the contact
tests.expected: Form submits successfully with no errors. Company attributes updated with inquiry data. enterprise_inquiry event tracked with full details.

tests.description: Cookie consent banner appears when Brevo is configured
steps: Clear all cookies for the Scanopy app
Load the app in a browser
Verify the cookie consent banner appears
tests.expected: Cookie consent banner is displayed to new visitors when SCANOPY_BREVO_API_KEY is configured.
